stories.name: Aditya Dwi Nugroho
stories.title: Starting This Project
stories.story: I created this project to help people practice their first contributions during Hacktoberfest. I wanted to make something simple where anyone could participate, regardless of their coding skills.

stories.name: Karan R
stories.title: My Open Source Journey
stories.story: I am pretty new to contributing to open source, but have been a fan of open source software forever. The idea that a group of people can collectively create products that are sometimes close to or even better than mega corporations is what surprised me. This motivated me to learn how to contribute to open source and here I am, trying to slowly learn various aspects of contributing.

stories.name: Example Contributor
stories.title: My First Open Source Contribution
stories.story: This was my first time contributing to open source! I was nervous at first, but the process was really simple. I just added my story to the JSON file and created a pull request. The maintainer was super helpful and merged it quickly. Now I feel confident to contribute to more projects!
